```{r pkg.load, include = FALSE}
    "knitr",

    "collapsibleTree",
    "flextable",

    "officedown",

    "here"
)

    pkg_lst,
    library,
    character.only = TRUE
)

setwd(
    paste(
        git = here(),
        project = "precision",
        sep = "/"
    )
)

source("lib_ft.r")
```
